Class GameController

java.lang.Object
controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
Controls the main game logic, flow, and interactions between models and views.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameController(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
    Constructor to initialize the game controller and views.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Constructor to initialize the game controller and views. Sets up the player, starting items, and UI components.
      Parameters:
      stage - The primary stage

  • Method Details

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Runs a runnable action after a specified delay.

    • startStage

      public void startStage(int stage)
      Initializes and starts a specific stage. Sets up the enemy, updates the UI, and resets player status.
      Parameters:
      stage - The stage number to start

    • nextStage

      public void nextStage()
      Advances to the next stage or wins the game if the last stage is cleared.

    • handleAttack

      public void handleAttack()
      Handles the player's attack action. Calculates damage, handles dodging, and updates the battle log.

    • handleHeal

      public void handleHeal()
      Handles the player's heal action. Uses the player's special ability to restore HP.

    • goToShop

      public void goToShop()
      Transitions the view to the Shop screen. Generates appropriate items for sale based on the next stage.

    • goToInventory

      public void goToInventory(boolean returnToBattle)
      Transitions the view to the Inventory screen.
      Parameters:
      returnToBattle - true if the inventory is accessed from battle, false otherwise

    • backFromInventory

      public void backFromInventory(boolean toBattle)
      Handles returning from the Inventory screen.
      Parameters:
      toBattle - true to return to battle, false to return to the shop

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer()
      Gets the player entity.
      Returns:
      The player

    • getOwnedWeapons

      public List<Weapon> getOwnedWeapons()
      Gets the list of owned weapons.
      Returns:
      List of owned weapons

    • getOwnedArmors

      public List<Armor> getOwnedArmors()
      Gets the list of owned armors.
      Returns:
      List of owned armors
